name: finest needles
description:
Quality needles in an array of sizes and portable packaging.

25 assorted fine sewing needles in pack with threader.

name: fine black safety pins
description:
Properly useful little black safety pins that you would regeret not buying.

A tidy amount, or boxful, of tiny (23mm) fine, black safety pins for all your safety pinning needs, except the big ones.

name: black bulb pins
description:
The bulb pin lets a tag hang tidily from a safety pin and is perfectly simple.

21mm long and like safety pins but with a wide bowl at the bottom for tags etc. Already pear shaped so nothing can go wrong.

name: glass headed pins
description:
Lovely glass headed pins in a multitude of colours to suit your every mood.

Multi-coloured glass headed pins - easy to find in fabric! 30mm x 0.60mm

name: tailor's chalk
description:
British stamped traditional tailor's chalk in white.

Traditional tailor's chalk in white.

name: tailor's thimble
description:
Proper Tailor's Thimble with a hole athe top - stamped: Made in England.

The capless tailor's thimble, you will notice, has an open top for tactile fabric control. It protects your finger without affecting dexterity.

name: tailor's beeswax
description:
A lump of beeswax to assist in needle threading, easing drawers and many more.

Pure beeeswax in pot with lid. Ideal for needle threading and 3 million other uses.

name: wide bow scissors
description:
Tougher than old boots and supremely sharp and black..

Wide bow scissors - 4" (10cm) small and precise in a deep, permanent black steel.

name: buttonhole scissors
description:
Sturdy Sheffield scissors made especially for neat and tidy buttonholes.

5.5"  (14cm) Sheffield made buttonhole scissors. Long handles and short blades that cut well even at the tip.

name: spanish lace pins
description:
These short redheads come all the way from the oldest pin factory in Spain.

Traditional lace making pins that were originally colour coded for following a pattern but we like them just in flame red! 0.59mm x 26mm (approx 200 pins)

name: toilet pins
description:
At 49mm long, these Spanish made pins are strong, and quite beautiful.

These traditional toilet pins are an unusual pin being quite long at 49mm. Before the button became commonplace, many clothes were pinned together and a lady would have pins on her dressing table. The toilet pins come from and era when one would need pins for hats, corsage,etc. These are made in Spain and used to pin together layers of very thick fabrics - particularly useful in curtain making.

name: entomology pins
description:
Entomology Pins 100

Spare the butterflies and use these ultrafine black pins for your silks and antique cloths.

Merchant & Mills are proud to have sourced the finest, blackest pins known to man. For butterflies and fine fabrics, these are irresistible.  38mm x 0.45mm

name: Leather bag handles
description:
Hand cut - 3cm x 63cm
cow hide
saddle brown
unpunched
easy to punch with a small awl & hammer

name: Merchant & Mills dress pattern - Panel Dress
description: Straight fitting dress with interesting bodice panels. Short sleeve or sleeveless. Dress looks great with contrast for the bodice panels or reverse of fabric. Linen, Liberty, wool crepe.

name: Merchant & Mills dress pattern - No 64 Top
description: Really cool top with pockets, long raglan sleeves, over the head. Make it with anything! Heavy or light. Patterns are true to size. See size chart.

name: Merchant & Mills dress pattern - Madison
description: Classic style dress with 3 sleeve & 2 skirt options. side pockets, back zipper, classic neckline. Suits a variety of fabrics - stiff evening fabric, denim, linen, Liberty, wool crepe/suiting.

name: Merchant & Mills dress pattern - Park Lane
description:
A great dress for slinking about at night!
Draped dress with high cut neck, off the shoulder sleeve, back neck opening, self tie belt, side pockets. Hangs very nicely (my favourite dress), suits fabric with a little give -  wool crepe, wool jersey/ponti, light weight fabric with a little stretch.

name: Merchant & Mills dress pattern - Trapeze
description: Gorgeous swing dress with 3 sleeve options. Sits on the knee. True to size. Nicely cut neckline. Suits fabric with some drape - wool suiting, wool crepe, linen, Liberty, light denim.

name: subscription
description: become a subscriber to HAZEL GREEN and enjoy great company and inspiration on the second tuesday of each month from 7 - 10pm. Bring along whatever you are working on and meet some new faces or catch up with some old!

name: vintage fabric 'daisy' skirt
description: Summer 'daisy' yellow, with navy & white trim. Elastic waist & front pocket.

name: Denim 'circle' shorts
description: Soft denim, just above the knee, elastic waist & ribbon tie. Gold circles on back.
